name: 丘吉尔的秘密
summary: 1953年的夏天，晚年丘吉尔遭受了一次危及生命的中风。党中觊觎首相之位的人蠢蠢欲动，他的家人也望其退位安享晚年。而丘吉尔本人，仍然希望自己以首相身份参加国际会议，为世界和平作出最后一次努力。 Set during the summer months of 1953 Churchill—now Prime Minister for the second time and in his late 70’s—suffers a life-threatening s troke, which is kept secret from the world. Told from the viewpoint of his young Nurse, Millie Appleyard, the drama follows his battle to recover as...
